  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    AlreadyExistsException

    public class ConfigurationException
extends RequestValidationException
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
Often called with Ec2Snitch, TypeParser, PropertyFileSnitch, CFMetaData. Shall be called with ThriftConversion, CassandraRoleManager, AbstractReplicationStrategy, BootStrapper, SSTableExport, SchemaKeyspace, DropKeyspaceStatement, SizeTieredCompactionStrategyOptions, AbstractCompactionStrategy, DatabaseDescriptor, StorageService, IAuthenticator, AllowAllAuthenticator, LeveledCompactionStrategy, PasswordAuthenticator, TimeWindowCompactionStrategyOptions, SimpleStrategy, TableAttributes, CassandraAuthorizer, SystemKeyspace, LZ4Compressor, IInternodeAuthenticator, AllowAllInternodeAuthenticator, LocalStrategy, TimeWindowCompactionStrategy, DateTieredCompactionStrategyOptions, NetworkTopologyStrategy, MigrationManager, IRoleManager, SizeTieredCompactionStrategy, DateTieredCompactionStrategy, Token.TokenFactory, FBUtilities, IAuthorizer, ConfigurationLoader, DropTableStatement.
